title: Method to report trolling in champ select
body: Hey guys, I'm almost definitely not the first to post about this, and I highly doubt my input will be factored in at all by anyone at riot, however I feel some method of reporting should be able to be utilised in champ select, otherwise you see people who purposefully troll champ select in order to get people to dodge, as that is where they get their fun from but is also seen in the case of people who instalock for not getting their preferred role. Too many times have I been denied the opportunity to report someone all because someone in the queue had to dodge in order to avoid wasting 20 minutes of our time to a game with a troll player in it.
